CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(AccountId)), NOT(Account.Is_General__c), OR( Account.Prioritized__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "0"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "1"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "2"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "3"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "4") ) ), 1, 0 ) + IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(The_Insured_Name__c)), NOT(The_Insured_Name__r.Is_General__c), OR( The_Insured_Name__r.Prioritized__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(The_Insured_Name__r.Type, "0"), ISPICKVAL(The_Insured_Name__r.Type, "1"), ISPICKVAL(The_Insured_Name__r.Type, "2"), ISPICKVAL(The_Insured_Name__r.Type, "3"), ISPICKVAL(The_Insured_Name__r.Type, "4") ) ), 1, 0 )
CustomField.label: is KYC Account
